name: astonish
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.
short_effect: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: The user attacks the foe while shouting in a startling fashion. It may also make the target flinch.
flavor_text.platinum: The user attacks the foe while shouting in a startling fashion. It may also make the target flinch.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: The user attacks the foe while shouting in a startling fashion. It may also make the target flinch.
